divs: Sighting DetailsPlease contact me via email I would much rather send you the video I shot From my phone and possibly a phone conversation. There are too many details for me to write down now. The event just happened about 3 hours ago. I've seen some weird things in the sky before, I'm sure everybody has, But I recorded this and there's 3 other witnesses and it really happened.
